\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{mathtools}
\usepackage[no-math]{fontspec}
\setmainfont{TeX Gyre Termes}[
  SmallCapsFeatures={LetterSpace=5}
]
\usepackage[
  slantedGreek,
  mtpccal,mtpscr,mtpfrak,mtphrb
]{mtpro2}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\zswash}  {\mathalpha}{letters}{"B4}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfimath}{\mathalpha}{letters}{"10}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfjmath}{\mathalpha}{letters}{"11}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfgrave}{\mathalpha}{letters}{"12}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfacute}{\mathalpha}{letters}{"13}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfcheck}{\mathalpha}{letters}{"14}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfbreve}{\mathalpha}{letters}{"15}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfbar}  {\mathalpha}{letters}{"16}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfhat}  {\mathalpha}{letters}{94}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfdot}  {\mathalpha}{letters}{95}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbftilde}{\mathalpha}{letters}{126}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfddot} {\mathalpha}{letters}{127}
\DeclareMathSymbol{\mbfldot} {\mathalpha}{letters}{46}
%\DeclareMathSymbol{\calMi}   {\mathalpha}{letters}{'075}
%\DeclareMathSymbol{\calMii}  {\mathalpha}{letters}{'076}
\usepackage{bm}
\usepackage[hmargin=1.75in,vmargin=1.25in]{geometry}
\newcommand\test[1]{%
  $#1$\par
  $\scriptstyle#1$\par
  $\scriptscriptstyle#1$\par
  \medskip\par
}
\newcommand\testext[1]{%
  $#1$\par
  $\displaystyle#1$\par
  \medskip\par
}
\newcommand*\digits{%
  0123456789%
}
\newcommand*\latinalphabet{%
  abcdefghi[\imath]j[\jmath]kl[\ell]mnop[\wp]qrstuvwxyz[\zswash]%
}
\newcommand*\ordinarylatinalphabet{%
  abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz%
}
\newcommand*\calandbblatinalphabet{%
  abcdefghi[\imath]j[\jmath]klmnopqrstuvwxyz%
}
\newcommand*\scrlatinalphabet{%
  abcdefghi[\imath]j[\jmath]klmnopqr[\altr]stuvwxyz[\altz]%
}
\newcommand*\fraklatinalphabet{%
  abcdefghi[\imath]j[\jmath]klmnopqrstuvwx[\altx]y[\alty]z%
}
\newcommand*\Latinalphabet{%
  ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ%
}
\newcommand*\calLatinalphabet{%
  ABCDEFG[\altG]HIJKLM[\altM]N[\altN]OPQ[\altQ]RSTUVWXY[\altY]Z%
}
\newcommand*\scrLatinalphabet{%
  ABC[\altC]DEFG[\altG]HI[\altI]JKL[\altL]MN%
  OPQ[\altQ]RS[\altS]TUVWXY[\altY]Z[\altZ]%
}
\newcommand*\frakLatinalphabet{%
  ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXY[\altY]Z%
}
\newcommand*\greekalphabet{%
  \alpha\beta[\varbeta]\gamma\delta[\vardelta]\epsilon[\varepsilon]%
  \zeta\eta\theta[\vartheta]\iota\kappa[\varkappa]\lambda\mu\nu\xi
  \pi[\varpi]\rho[\varrho]\sigma[\varsigma]\tau\upsilon\phi[\varphi]%
  \chi\psi\omega
}
\newcommand*\Greekalphabet{%
  \Gamma\Delta\Theta\Lambda\Xi\Pi\Sigma\Upsilon\Phi\Psi\Omega
}
\newcommand*\upgreekalphabet{%
  \upalpha\upbeta[\upvarbeta]\upgamma\updelta[\upvardelta]%
  \upepsilon[\upvarepsilon]\upzeta\upeta\uptheta[\upvartheta]%
  \upiota\upkappa[\upvarkappa]\uplambda\upmu\upnu\upxi
  \uppi[\upvarpi]\uprho[\upvarrho]\upsigma[\upvarsigma]%
  \uptau\upupsilon\upphi[\upvarphi]\upchi\uppsi\upomega
}
\newcommand*\upGreekalphabet{%
  \upGamma\upDelta\upTheta\upLambda\upXi\upPi
  \upSigma\upUpsilon\upPhi\upPsi\upOmega
}
\newcommand*\punctuationandothers{%
  !,.?()[]<>/\partial\flat\natural\sharp\star\smile\frown
  \leftharpoonup\leftharpoondown\rightharpoonup\rightharpoondown
  \lhook\rhook\dagger\ddagger\mathsection\mathparagraph\dbar\updbar
}
\newcommand*\mbfothers{%
  \mbfimath\mbfjmath
  \mbfgrave\mbfacute\mbfcheck\mbfbreve\mbfbar
  \mbfhat\mbfdot\mbftilde\mbfddot\mbfldot
}
\newcommand*\bmpunctuationandothers{%
  !,.?()[]<>/\partial\flat\natural\sharp\star\smile\frown
  \leftharpoonup\leftharpoondown\rightharpoonup\rightharpoondown
  \lhook\rhook\dagger\ddagger\dbar\updbar
}
\newcommand*\mathem{\mskip18mu\relax}
\newcommand*\mathen{\mskip9mu\relax}
\newcommand*\basicsymbolsi{%
  *+-:;=\langle\rangle|\backslash % 10
  \aleph\Re\Im\infty\prime\emptyset\nabla\surd\top\bot % 10
  \forall\exists\neg\clubsuit\diamondsuit\heartsuit\spadesuit % 7
  \smallint\triangleleft\triangleright\bigtriangleup\bigtriangledown % 5
  \wedge\vee\cap\cup\sqcap\sqcup\uplus\amalg\diamond\bullet % 10
  \wr\div\odot\oslash\otimes\ominus\oplus % 7
} % 49
\newcommand*\basicsymbolsii{%
  \mp\pm\circ\bigcirc\cdot\times\propto\sqsubseteq\sqsupseteq % 9
  \parallel\dashv\vdash\nearrow\searrow\nwarrow\swarrow % 7
  \Leftrightarrow\Leftarrow\Rightarrow\leq\geq\approx % 6
  \succ\prec\succeq\preceq\supset\subset\supseteq\subseteq % 8
  \in\ni\gg\ll\not\mathem % 5
  \leftrightarrow\leftarrow\rightarrow\mapstochar % 4
} % 39
\newcommand*\basicsymbolsiii{%
  \sim\simeq\equiv\asymp\Relbar\vec*% 6
  \grave*\acute*\check*\breve*\bar*\hat*\dot*\tilde*\ddot*\mathring*% 10
  \uparrow\downarrow\updownarrow\Uparrow\Downarrow\Updownarrow % 6
  \lbrace\rbrace\lceil\rceil\lfloor\rfloor % 6
  \openclubsuit\shadedclubsuit\openspadesuit\shadedspadesuit % 4
  \hbar\hslash\digamma\comp\setdif\cupprod\capprod\simarrow\varland % 9
  \contraction\coloneq\eqcolon\hateq\circdashbullet\bulletdashcirc % 6
} % 47
\newcommand*\basicsymbolsiv{%
  \dddot*\mathen\ddddot*\mathen % 2
  \dotup*\mathen\ddotup*\mathen\dddotup*\mathen\ddddotup*\mathen % 4
  \what*\mathen\wtilde*\mathen\wcheck*\mathen\wbar*\mathen\wwbar*\mathen % 5
  \angle\models\bowtie\cong\Longleftrightarrow\rightleftharpoons\notin % 7
  \notless\notleq\notprec\notpreceq\notsubset\notsubseteq\notsqsubseteq % 7
  \notgr\notgeq\notsucc\notsucceq\notsupset\notsupseteq\notsqsupseteq % 7
  \neq\notequiv\notsim\notsimeq\notapprox\notcong\notasymp % 7
} % 39
\newcommand*\basicsymbolsv{%
  \doteq\hookleftarrow\hookrightarrow\longleftarrow\longrightarrow % 5
  \Longleftarrow\Longrightarrow\mapsto\longmapsto\longleftrightarrow % 5
  \straightbraces\lbrace\rbrace%\morphedbraces\lbrace\rbrace % 2
  \text{Serge\u\i\ \t Iur'ev}% 1
} % 13
\parindent  0pt\relax
\thinmuskip 0mu\relax
\medmuskip  0mu\relax
\thickmuskip0mu\relax
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
\section{Math italic, 183}
\test\digits
\test\latinalphabet
\test\Latinalphabet
\test\greekalphabet
\test\Greekalphabet
\test\upgreekalphabet
\test\upGreekalphabet
\test\punctuationandothers
\section{Math bold, 74 \& space}
\test{\mbf\digits}%
\test{\mbf\ordinarylatinalphabet}%
\test{\mbf\Latinalphabet}%
\test{\mbf\mbfothers}%
\section{Bold math italic, 181}
\test{\bm\digits}%
\test{\bm\latinalphabet}%
\test{\bm\Latinalphabet}%
\test{\bm\greekalphabet}%
\test{\bm\Greekalphabet}%
\test{\bm\upgreekalphabet}%
\test{\bm\upGreekalphabet}%
\test{\bm\bmpunctuationandothers}%
\section{Math curly, 59 \& space}
\test{\mathcal\calandbblatinalphabet}%
\test{\mathcal\calLatinalphabet}%
\section{Math script, 64 \& space}
\test{\mathscr\scrlatinalphabet}%
\test{\mathscr\scrLatinalphabet}%
\section{Bold math script, 64 \& space}
\test{\bm{\mathscr\scrlatinalphabet}}%
\test{\bm{\mathscr\scrLatinalphabet}}%
\section{Math fraktur, 57 \& space}
\test{\mathfrak\fraklatinalphabet}%
\test{\mathfrak\frakLatinalphabet}%
\section{Bold math fraktur, 57 \& space}
\test{\bm{\mathfrak\fraklatinalphabet}}%
\test{\bm{\mathfrak\frakLatinalphabet}}%
\section{Math holey roman bold, 64 \& space}
\test{\mathbb\digits}%
\test{\mathbb\calandbblatinalphabet}%
\test{\mathbb\Latinalphabet}%
\section{Math holey roman dark, 64 \& space}
\test{\bm{\mathbb\digits}}%
\test{\bm{\mathbb\calandbblatinalphabet}}%
\test{\bm{\mathbb\Latinalphabet}}%
\section{Basic symbols, 187}
\test\basicsymbolsi
\test\basicsymbolsii
\test\basicsymbolsiii
\test\basicsymbolsiv
\test\basicsymbolsv
